document_data.name: Dazzle
document_data.mainbody:
{{Otheruses4|the spell|the creature|al-jahar}}
'''''Dazzle''''' was an [[evocation]] [[spell]] that created a blinding burst of light to appear in front of the caster. It was a common spell among the  [[Red Wizards of Thay]] but rare outside of [[Thay]].<ref>
document_data.Effects: Any creature caught within the 12' (3.7 m) area of effect created by this spell was partially blinded for a matter of moments. As a result, they were less capable in combat and had difficulty performing skilled tasks. Those who could shake off the spell's effects overcame the blindness much more rapidly.
